snippet: South Africa’s highest court on Thursday dismissed a final appeal from the former track star to overturn his murder conviction in the 2013 death of his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp.
abstract: South Africa's highest court dismisses former track star Oscar Pistorius' final appeal to overturn his murder conviction in 2013 death of his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.
lead_paragraph: South Africa’s highest court on Thursday dismissed a final appeal from the former track star to overturn his murder conviction in the 2013 death of his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp.

headline.main: South Africa: Oscar Pistorius’s Appeal of Conviction Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Africa; South Africa: Setback for Pistorius
